titleStmt.title: An answer to Moggy's misfortune: or, The kind and courteous courtship of Shakum Guy, after the funeral of his cross and froward wife; which proved the two lovers happy conclusion. Tune of Robin Cusbe. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
